md/TestPage/chatlog.html.title: Chatlog
md/TestPage/chatlog.html.body: chatlog .chatlog__entry.mojombo .chatlog__message::before { border: 6px solid transparent; border-right-color: #ddd} .chatlog__entry.mojombo .chatlog__message { background-color: #ddd;color: #000; } .chatlog__entry.chatlog__entry_flip.mojombo .chatlog__message::before { border: 6px solid transparent; border-left-color: #ddd} .chatlog__entry.claylo .chatlog__message::before { border: 6px solid transparent; border-right-color: #08f} .chatlog__entry.claylo .chatlog__message { background-color: #08f;color: #fff; } .chatlog__entry.chatlog__entry_flip.claylo .chatlog__message::before { border: 6px solid transparent; border-left-color: #08f} 12/31/15 Mmmm. Chat. yeah, man. © 2017 Trashman all right reserved，powered by Gitbook修訂時間： 2017-08-12 03:45:00

md/TestPage/include-codeblock.html.title: Include Codeblock
md/TestPage/include-codeblock.html.body:
include-codeblock example of code #include #include #include #include #include #include #include // the max connection number of the server #define MAX_CONNECTION_NUMBER 5 /* * Create a server endpoint of a connection. * Returns fd if all OK, = 0 ) { // rvbuf[size]='\0'; printf( "Recieved Data[%d]:%c...%c
", size, rvbuf[0], rvbuf[size - 1] ); } if ( size == -1 ) { printf( "Error[%d] when recieving Data:%s.
", errno, strerror( errno ) ); break; } /* //===========Sent============== memset(rvbuf, 'c', 2048); size = send(connfd, rvbuf, 2048, 0); if(size>=0) { printf("Data[%d] Sended.
",size); } if(size==-1) { printf("Error[%d] when Sending Data.
",errno); break; } */ sleep( 1 ); } unix_socket_close( connfd ); printf( "Server exited.
" ); } 1-2: #include #include 2-3: #include #include 2>=: #include #include #include #include #include #include // the max connection number of the server #define MAX_CONNECTION_NUMBER 5 /* * Create a server endpoint of a connection. * Returns fd if all OK, = 0 ) { // rvbuf[size]='\0'; printf( "Recieved Data[%d]:%c...%c
", size, rvbuf[0], rvbuf[size - 1] ); } if ( size == -1 ) { printf( "Error[%d] when recieving Data:%s.
", errno, strerror( errno ) ); break; } /* //===========Sent============== memset(rvbuf, 'c', 2048); size = send(connfd, rvbuf, 2048, 0); if(size>=0) { printf("Data[%d] Sended.
",size); } if(size==-1) { printf("Error[%d] when Sending Data.
",errno); break; } */ sleep( 1 ); } unix_socket_close( connfd ); printf( "Server exited.
" ); } #include #include #include © 2017 Trashman all right reserved，powered by Gitbook修訂時間： 2017-08-12 03:45:00

md/TestPage/sectionx.html.body: sectionx Introduction This page is implemented using the two plugins developed by me: !FILENAME //github.com/ymcatar/gitbook-plugin-sectionx) for the plugin. gitbook-plugin-sectionx, please check the [Github repo](https The source code for this page is available here. Example 1 This is a section that is by default visible. You can toggle this with the button in the title. The next section is hidden by default, you can add a custom button to toggle it (see GitHub for the syntax). Example 2 This is a section that is by default closed but visible (with data-collapse=true) Hidden 3 This section can only be opened with that button. © 2017 Trashman all right reserved，powered by Gitbook修訂時間： 2017-08-12 03:45:00
